title: Ticket #5869: Annex code needs to check for loose Spot Fleet on E_CURL_IO.
description: If, when we command the GAHP to create a new Spot Fleet, it replies with E_CURL_IO, we either need to check to see if the new Spot Fleet was created or not or just try again, if the client token can be used to ensure idempotence.
remarks:
2016-Aug-30 16:17:21 by tlmiller:
For the first release, we're just returning an error message with the ClientToken. We need to do some thinking about how long the daemon should leave the client hanging while it's retrying, since the client blocks until the daemon replies.
check_ins: 2016-Aug-30 14:47   Check-in [49105]: (#5869) Return errors to the client (for now, don't worry about retries on i/o errors), including the client token. Implement the client token. (By Todd L Miller )
